content.text: Hi! My name is participant_1 and I'm a freelance writer.
Hi participant_2, my name is participant_2 and I'm a waitress at a local restaurant.
That's cool! What's your favorite part about being a waitress?
I like the interaction with the customers and the tips are always nice.
I'm a big fan of tips myself! What's your favorite type of music?
I love Nirvana. They're my favorite band.
Nice! They're one of my favorite bands too.
I'm glad to meet someone else who likes them.
Me too! What's your favorite song by them?
I'm not sure if I have a favorite song, but I really like "In Bloom" and "Come as You Are".
Those are both great songs! What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I like to go to concerts, read, and watch movies.
I love going to concerts too! What's the last concert you went to?
I went to see Nirvana at Madison Square Garden a few years ago.
That must have been amazing! I'm jealous!
It was amazing! I'm so glad I got to see them live before Kurt Cobain died.
Me too! What's your favorite movie?
I don't have a favorite movie, but I really like "The Lord of the Rings" trilogy.
Those are great movies! I love the fantasy genre.
Me too! What's your favorite book?
I don't have a favorite book, but I really like "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy" series.
Those are great books! I love the humor.
Me too! I think we're going to get along just fine.
